title: XmlValidate
name: XmlValidate
description: Uses a Document Type Definition (DTD) or XML Schema to validate an XML text document or an XML document object.

arguments.name: validator
arguments.description:
Any of the following:
 - A string containing a DTD or Schema.
 - The name of a DTD or Schema file.
 - The URL of a DTD or Schema file; valid protocol identifiers include http, https, ftp, and file.
